    • activeBlock

      protected java.util.List<Cell> activeBlock​(java.util.List<Player> p, Board b, Worker w, Status current)
      If the ability influences opposite turns this method return blocked cells (QUESTION_M for move and QUESTION_B for build).
      Parameters:
      w - active worker
      p - player
      b - board
      current - current state of current turn
      Returns:
      list with blocked cell
